column1: [[Image:The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings.jpg
'''The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings''' (To Honor the Silver Anniversary) was produced by [[Middle-earth Enterprises
column2: Tolkien Enterprises]] and illustrated by [[Paul Rivoche]] with images loosely based on those of [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)]].
